mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_attach ( uuid, upload_path, filename, filetype, file_size, member_id, upload_date ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{filename}, #{filetype}, #{fileSize}, #{memberId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, uuid, upload_path as uploadPath, filename, filetype, file_size as fileSize, upload_date as uploadDate FROM file_attach ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT id, uuid, upload_path as uploadPath, filename, filetype, file_size as fileSize, member_id as memberId, upload_date as uploadDate FROM file_attach WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
